book_title: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 15
verse_text: And the cry of the people and their wives was great against their brethren the Jews.

book_title: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 15
verse_text: And some said, We are numerous with our sons and our daughters; so we will take corn, and eat, and live.

book_title: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 15
verse_text: And some said, As to our fields and vineyards and houses, let us pledge them , and we will take corn, and eat.

book_title: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 15
verse_text: And some said, We have borrowed money for the king's tributes:â€”our fields, and our vineyards, and houses are pledged .

book_title: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 15
verse_text: And now our flesh is as the flesh of our brethren, our children are as their children: yet, behold, we are reducing our sons and our daughters to slavery, and some of our daughters are enslaved: and there is no power of our hands, for our fields and our vineyards belong to the nobles.

book_title: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 15
verse_text: And I was much grieved as I heard their cry and these words.

book_title: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 15
verse_text: And my heart took counsel within me, and I contended against the nobles, and the princes, and I said to them, Should every man demand of his brother what ye demand? And I appointed against them a great assembly,

book_title: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 15
verse_text: and I said to them, We of our free-will have redeemed our brethren the Jews that were sold to the Gentiles; and do ye sell your brethren? and shall they be delivered to us? And they were silent, and found no answer.

book_title: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 15
verse_text: And I said, The thing which ye do is not good; ye will not so walk in the fear of our God because of the reproach of the Gentiles our enemies.

book_title: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 15
verse_text: Both my brethren, and my acquaintances, and I, have lent them money and corn: let us now leave off this exaction.

book_title: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 15
verse_text: Restore to them, I pray, as at this day, their fields, and their vineyards, and their olive-yards, and their houses, and bring forth to them corn and wine and oil of the money.

book_title: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 15
verse_text: And they said, We will restore, and we will not exact of them; we will do thus as thou sayest. Then I called the priests, and bound them by oath to do according to this word.

book_title: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 15
verse_text: And I shook out my garment, and said, So may God shake out every man who shall not keep to this word, from his house, and from his labours, he shall be even thus shaken out, as an outcast and empty. And all the congregation said, Amen, and they praised the Lord: and the people did this thing.

book_title: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 15
verse_text: From the day that he charged me to be their ruler in the land of Juda, from the twentieth year even to the thirty-second year of Arthasastha, twelve years, I and my brethren ate not provision extorted from them.

book_title: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 15
verse_text: But as for the former acts of extortion wherein those who were before me oppressed them, they even took of them their last money, forty didrachms for bread and wine; and the very outcasts of them exercised authority over the people: but I did not so, because of the fear of God.

book_title: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 15
verse_text: Also in the work of the wall I treated them not with rigour, I bought not land: and all that were gathered together came thither to the work.

book_title: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 15
verse_text: And the Jews, to the number of a hundred and fifty men, besides those coming to us from the nations round about, were at my table.

book_title: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 15
verse_text: And there came to me for one day one calf, and I had six choice sheep and a goat; and every ten days wine in abundance of all sorts: yet with these I required not the bread of extortion, because the bondage was heavy upon this people.

book_title: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 15
verse_text: Remember me, O God, for good, in all that I have done to this people.
